duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the definition, and implementation of an architecture road map for Java Microservices solution on Azure cloud.
Migrate applications to Azure Cloud and understand various components.
Deep understanding of Azure IAM solutions and their application in enterprise grade secure solutions.
Hands-on development with a focus on achieving MVP/POC to demonstrate understanding to technical stakeholders.
Familiarity with data management, security, analysis, and analytics in regulated industries.
Experience with service Mesh architecture and side car proxy for scalability and performance needs.
Develop and deploy applications in containerized production environments and shift from monolithic legacy apps to cloud-native.
Work within a team and as an individual contributor in a fast-paced, changing environment.
Maintain regular and predictable attendance and demonstrate solid communication and interpersonal skills.
Utilize out of the box thinking to solve problems and innovate rapidly.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or advanced degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
